verses.verse: אָ֭הַבְתִּי <S%H157><s%> I love כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because יִשְׁמַ֥ע ׀ <S%H8085><s%> because he hath heard יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ק֝וֹלִ֗י <S%H6963><s%> my voice תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ <S%H8469><s%> [and] my supplications

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because הִטָּ֣ה <S%H5186><s%> Because he hath inclined אָזְנ֣וֹ <S%H241><s%> his ear לִ֑י וּבְיָמַ֥י <S%H3117><s%> upon [him] as long as I live אֶקְרָֽא׃ <S%H7121><s%> unto me therefore will I call

אֲפָפ֤וּנִי ׀ <S%H661><s%> compassed חֶבְלֵי־ <S%H2256><s%> The sorrows מָ֗וֶת <S%H4194><s%> of death וּמְצָרֵ֣י <S%H4712><s%> me and the pains שְׁא֣וֹל <S%H7585><s%> of hell מְצָא֑וּנִי <S%H4672><s%> gat hold צָרָ֖ה <S%H6869><s%> trouble וְיָג֣וֹן <S%H3015><s%> and sorrow אֶמְצָֽא׃ <S%H4672><s%> upon me I found

וּבְשֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> I upon the name יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> Then called אָנָּ֥ה <S%H577><s%> I beseech יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD מַלְּטָ֥ה <S%H4422><s%> thee deliver נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> my soul
חַנּ֣וּן <S%H2587><s%> Gracious יְהֹוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] the LORD וְצַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> and righteous וֵ֖אלֹהֵ֣ינוּ <S%H430><s%> yea our God מְרַחֵֽם׃ <S%H7355><s%> [is] merciful
שֹׁמֵ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> preserveth פְּתָאיִ֣ם <S%H6612><s%> the simple יְהֹוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD דַּ֝לּוֹתִ֗י <S%H1809><s%> I was brought low וְלִ֣י יְהוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <S%H3467><s%> and he helped

שׁוּבִ֣י <S%H7725><s%> Return נַ֭פְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> O my soul לִמְנוּחָ֑יְכִי <S%H4496><s%> comfortable כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD גָּמַ֥ל <S%H1580><s%> hath dealt bountifully עָלָֽיְכִי׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for חִלַּ֥צְתָּ <S%H2502><s%> For thou hast delivered נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> my soul מִ֫מָּ֥וֶת <S%H4194><s%> from death אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינִ֥י <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from דִּמְעָ֑ה <S%H1832><s%> from tears אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רַגְלִ֥י <S%H7272><s%> [and] my feet מִדֶּֽחִי׃ <S%H1762><s%> from falling
אֶ֭תְהַלֵּךְ <S%H1980><s%> I will walk לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּ֝אַרְצ֗וֹת <S%H776><s%> in the land הַֽחַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> of the living

הֶ֭אֱמַנְתִּי <S%H539><s%> I believed כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when אֲדַבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> therefore have I spoken אֲ֝נִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I עָנִ֥יתִי <S%H6031><s%> afflicted מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> I was greatly
אֲ֭נִי <S%H589><s%> I אָמַ֣רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> I said בְחָפְזִ֑י <S%H2648><s%> in my haste כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הָאָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> All men כֹּזֵֽב׃ <S%H3576><s%> [are] liars

מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What אָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> What shall I render לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all תַּגְמוּל֥וֹהִי <S%H8408><s%> [for] all his benefits עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> toward

כּוֹס־ <S%H3563><s%> the cup יְשׁוּע֥וֹת <S%H3444><s%> of salvation אֶשָּׂ֑א <S%H5375><s%> I will take וּבְשֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> upon the name יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶקְרָֽא׃ <S%H7121><s%> and call

נְ֭דָרַי <S%H5088><s%> my vows לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֲשַׁלֵּ֑ם <S%H7999><s%> I will pay נֶגְדָה־ <S%H5048><s%> the presence נָּ֝֗א <S%H4994><s%> Oh לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all עַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> now in the presence of all his people
יָ֭קָר <S%H3368><s%> Precious בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הַ֝מָּ֗וְתָה <S%H4194><s%> [is] the death לַחֲסִידָֽיו׃ <S%H2623><s%> of his saints

אָֽנָּ֣ה <S%H577><s%> truly יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> surely אֲנִ֪י <S%H589><s%> I am עַ֫בְדֶּ֥ךָ <S%H5650><s%> I [am] thy servant אֲ‍ֽנִי־ <S%H589><s%> I am עַ֭בְדְּךָ <S%H5650><s%> I [am] thy servant בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> [and] the son אֲמָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H519><s%> of thine handmaid פִּ֝תַּ֗חְתָּ <S%H6605><s%> thou hast loosed לְמוֹסֵרָֽי׃ <S%H4147><s%> my bonds

לְֽךָ־ אֶ֭זְבַּח <S%H2076><s%> I will offer זֶ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> to thee the sacrifice תּוֹדָ֑ה <S%H8426><s%> of thanksgiving וּבְשֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> upon the name יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶקְרָֽא׃ <S%H7121><s%> and will call

נְ֭דָרַי <S%H5088><s%> my vows לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֲשַׁלֵּ֑ם <S%H7999><s%> I will pay נֶגְדָה־ <S%H5048><s%> the presence נָּ֝֗א <S%H4994><s%> Oh לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all עַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> now in the presence of all his people

בְּחַצְר֤וֹת ׀ <S%H2691><s%> In the courts בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> house יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S בְּֽת֘וֹכֵ֤כִי <S%H8432><s%> in the midst יְֽרוּשָׁלִָ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> of thee O Jerusalem הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> ye the LORD
